definition: to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight

sentences.english: After you wiped out the lice from of your husband's and sons' shirts.
sentences.chinese: 在你把夫兒們的襯衣上的蝨子一顆顆的掐死之後。

sentences.english: In fact, he wanted to strangle them, to get back at them.
sentences.chinese: 其實Richard是要報復他的同學，想掐死他們。

sentences.english: Because Qin has shouted loudly prays for rescue, Sun then chokes to death it.
sentences.chinese: 由於秦某一直高喊求救，孫某便將其掐死。

sentences.english: Or to choke a stray cat to death with your bare hands?
sentences.chinese: 抑或，親手掐死一隻流浪貓？

sentences.english: The big lion caught the little mouse to kill it.
sentences.chinese: 雄偉的獅子捉住了小小的老鼠，準備掐死他。

sentences.english: Dreverhaven: I'll strangle him for nine-tenths, and the last tenth will make him strong.
sentences.chinese: 我將會幾乎把他掐死，然後在最後一刻讓他變得強大。

sentences.english: With his hands round her throat he crushed the life out of her.
sentences.chinese: 他雙手扼住她的喉嚨把她掐死了。

sentences.english: His deepest fear is that budget politics will gut the military.
sentences.chinese: 他極度擔心有一天預算政治會將軍隊掐死。

definition: to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to execute on the spot (idiom); summary execution/to carry out the law on the spot
to infuriate/to be furious/to die from an excess of anger
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to beat up/to break to pieces
to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue
to pick (flowers)/to pinch/to nip/to pinch off/to clutch/(slang) to fight
